amendment.description: Amendment provides a funding level of $97.5 million for the Port Security Grant Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide funding for the Port Security Grant Program at the same $97,500,000 level as the previous fiscal year.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brownley (CA) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brownley (CA) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Ms. Brownley (CA).
